name: The Lizard Basement
description: Abducted to a strange, underground location. Can you escape the Lizard Basement?

1.name: Awakening
1.description: You awake from a deep and uneasy slumber, lying on the ground in a square room surrounded by stone brick walls and slimy vines. On one side of the room are iron bars with something that looks like a door in the middle. You don't remember a thing from what happened last night, but you do know that you feel like you had one drink too much. Time to find a way out of here!

paths.name: Prison door
paths.description: The prison door, with a lock that appears to be opened with a key.

1.hint: There must be something in this room you can investigate.

1-override.name: Starting chamber
1-override.description: This is where you started. It is a simple square prison room with an opened door.

1-override-override.name: Starting chamber
1-override-override.description: The starting room, once again! Find the exit!

paths.name: Suspicious vine
paths.description: A vine hanging a bit lower than the others.

paths.name: Cracked floor brick
paths.description: One of the floor bricks has cracks on it and can probably be broken with some force.

paths.name: Mossy patch on the wall
paths.description: There is a mossy patch on the wall. Maybe a push will open up a way?

test-thing-room.name: Thing Room
test-thing-room.description: There's a thing is this room

test-combat-room.name: Combat Room
test-combat-room.description: There's a combat is this room, so you'll only see this room after you resolved the combat

test-override-room.name: Test override room
test-override-room.description: The event on this room should trigger a change in description in room 1.

2.name: Room number 2
2.description: This is a description of room number 2

paths.name: Old wooden door
paths.description: This door seems like it has seen better days

paths.name: New wooden door
paths.description: This door seems newer than it's neighbour

paths.name: Hallway
paths.description: A narrow hallway, infested with snake eating spiders

2.hint: There is an NPC in this room, but he won't show up without the proper preparations.

old-metal-key.name: Old Metal Key
old-metal-key.description: This key can be used to open the old wooden door

tour-guide.name: Tour Guide
tour-guide.description: This guy seems he might know the way around town, and the maze

options.response: You are in a maze. I know that this maze has at least 7 rooms. Some pathways are easily accesable, other are more difficult to enter. If you manage to reach room 7 you might find an exit.

tour-guide.hint: This NPC can give the party an item or make it rain in the maze. This is required for something I don't really know this story very well.

test-thing.name: Test Thing

options.response: The thing starts to glow and turns into a rock

test-thing.hint: This Thing can be touched, it doesn't really like it though.

game-win.name: You won!
game-win.description: You have reached the ending, congrats!
game-win.message: The game is now over, you can reload the page.

1.title: Goblin ambush
1.description: A party of goblins ambushes you from the dark corners of the room. There are two goblin assassins and one goblin chief who charge at you while the chief yells 'gib me all da treasure!!'.
1.hint: Goblins are fast, nimble but also quite fragile and scare easily.

options.response: You go guns blazing and defeat those noobs.
The goblins come charging in, you stand your ground and defeat them.
You loot the corpses, finding a cool necklace

characters.name: Arnoud Krabbius
characters.title: The Barbarian
characters.description: Arnoud is a big, muscular half-orc. He loves fighting, using his gigantic two handed broad axe. Although he is an impressive combatant, he is easily tricked when facing witty enemies.
characters.backstory: Arnoud grew up in Arnhem, where 'Messentrekken' was a common move on the streets. This way he learned to always be ready for a fight.

characters.name: Joey Feed'r
characters.title: Longshot Lackey
characters.description: He can throw a frikadel like no other.
characters.backstory: Joey has always enjoyed food, and prefers to have breakfast that isn't particulary healthy. This passion for food gave him exceptional abilities when preparing future meals. He can throw any fast food with great power and accuracy.

characters.name: Spincent
characters.title: The Scary Spider
characters.backstory: After an unfortunate event Spincent grew extra legs, at first this seemed like a disadvantage, but soon he evolved. This turned him into a spider who has the size and strength of a human.
